name: Cruiser Kid
description:
• 3D shmup (think Space Harrier, Sin & Punishment, Starfox, etc) on Pico8 with 2.5D graphics
  • Leap over bullets and shoot down flying enemies with your Burst-Style Jetpack
  • 10 distinct enemy types. Can you reach them all????
  • Deep scoring system rewards accuracy and survival
    • I solo developed this in under a month for 3cJam 2017
